name: The World Is Totally Chaotic, Honey
name_original: The World Is Totally Chaotic, Honey
description:
The World is Totally Chaotic, Honey!

Welcome to our collaborative interactive fiction project! The prettysmart team streams game development on our leader's Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/drmikachu

Sometimes, we write an interactive fiction story together, and this is the result! The people who hang out in the chat during our sessions contribute ideas and we do our best to weave them into the plot.

The story isn't anywhere close to finished yet. You will see (parantheses) indicating future plans, and there's still much more to do! Every time we have a session, we will update the story here so you can keep up.
